resources.string: %1$s-এর সঙ্গে যোগাযোগ করার ক্ষেত্রে একটি ত্রুটি ঘটেছে।
অনুগ্রহ করে আপনার নেটওয়ার্কের সেটিংস্‌ দেখুন বা পরে আবার চেষ্টা করুন।
Your %1$s is used to sign in to all apps and services.\u0020
%1$s provides users with a passwordless login for all apps and services.
%1$s mobile subscribers enjoy additional security and convenience by having their phone numbers automatically recognised and verified by the %2$s mobile network.
With risk-based authentication, %1$s enhances user security by detecting unusual logins.

An unusual login might be caused by logging in from a new location, or someone trying to fraudulently use your %1$s. In any case, the user will experience additional steps when logging in, in order to prevent abuse.
Anyone can use %1$s, at no cost. You do not need to become a %2$s subscriber.
For higher risk logins, %1$s can request a password as an additional step.
One secure login for all services
